1.2.name: wordpress/arabic-comments-number
1.2.description:
the idea of the plugin from this post

bascally the plugin generats two functions you can use them in your theme

the functions are: 1. comments_number_ar('لا توجد تعليقات', 'تعليق واحد', 'تعليقان', '% تعليقات', '% تعليق' );
2. comments_popup_link_ar('لا توجد تعليقات', 'تعليق واحد', 'تعليقان', '% تعليقات', '% تعليق' );

the functions are similar to functions comments_number () and comments_popup_link () I just edit them to be correct with Arabic grammare.

  • For more information http://6efy.com/blog/?page_id=2222
